messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Internet bullying/bashing online
messages.msgSnippet: Good morning friends. Last nite I tried to log on the that site I sent here about the online bashing kids are doing and to my shock a local talk radio station
messages.messageBody:
Good morning friends.

Last nite I tried to log on the that site I sent here about the online
bashing kids are doing and to my shock a local talk radio station made such a
stink about it the site was closed down!!! I am completely for freedom of
speech but apparently there were occasions in which violence was being
threatened on this site and sought out in life.

Just thought you'd all like to know. The site was <A HREF="www.schoolscandals.com">www.schoolscandals.com</A>.
Poor little bully's, I wonder if they feel bullied themselves, since someone
bigger shut them up?

Peace,
Rhonda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
